official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to codify and
		  improve the election requirements for the receipt of educational assistance
		  under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance program of the Department of
		  Veterans Affairs.

on the individual’s behalf. The

is in the best interests of the

shall provide the notice required under this paragraph by electronic
